# praiseme4

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of praiseme4 is to deliver praise!

## Installation

You can install the development version of praiseme4 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("njtierney/praiseme4")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(praiseme4)
praise()
praise(name = "Michael, Fang, Vis, Christy")
```
